name: 李文亞
objective:
奈米電子科技與半導體製程技術在近年來受到極大的重視，因此在本課程將介紹電子電路學與最新的奈米技術，內容包含有基礎電學、電子電路學與半導體製程，以及奈米材料 (如奈米碳管、石墨烯、二維奈米材料等)，期許可以帶給同學當今最新的奈米化技術與半導體相關之科技知識。
Nanotechnology and semiconductors have great progress in recent years. This class will introduce the latest information about nanomaterials and semiconductor processes. The semiconductor processes include diffusion, thin films, photolithography, and etching, while nanomaterials include fullerene, carbon nanotube, graphene, and molybdenum disulfide. Their physical, chemical, optoelectronic, and sensory properties will be comprehensively introduced. We expect to bring the knowledge of the newest nanomaterials and technologies to students.
